intro: [WRONG START] COLDENIA PALMERI, commonly known as Palmer's coldenia, is a flowering plant native to the Caribbean islands. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered white or pink flowers and opposite, ovate leaves. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as forest understories. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
